text: Forbidden is a 1953 American crime thriller movie directed by Rudolph Maté and starring Tony Curtis, Joanne Dru, Marvin Miller, Lyle Bettger, Weaver Levy. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1953 crime movies Category:1953 thriller movies Category:1950s crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Rudolph Maté Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Macau
title: Forbidden (1953 movie)
